claim: The story of Betsy Ross designing the first American flag is likely apocryphal.

supporting.text: There is no contemporaneous evidence linking Betsy Ross to the design of the first American flag; the story only emerged decades later through family oral tradition.

attacks.text: There is no contemporaneous evidence linking Betsy Ross to the design of the first American flag; the story only emerged decades later through family oral tradition.
